segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even see the water flooding the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already wet, but she doesn’t react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m amazed he hasn’t fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is while her brother is about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don’t know whether to laugh or cry.
segments.speaker: PAR
